channel.title: How to "Hack" flash games.. [Download link is back!]
channel.description:
in this guide i will more or less just explain what things mean and stuff, im not 100% sure on some things so if im wrong please correct me, i mainly wanted to make this because when hellou made the post of his flash hacker alot of people where confused..
first things first where going to need a flash hacker hellou has gotten one you can download it [url=http://files.filefront.com/Flash+Hacker+FunPking/;9586344;/fileinfo.html]here[/url] ok once downloaded extract it and run [img]http://img114.imageshack.us/img114/338/flashhackicovt1.png[/img] ok for that flash hacker the work the url [b]must[/b] end in .swf since 90% of the url that you visit for a game wont actually end in .swf we must find the direct url for that game, i will teach you how to...
there are to types of urls that end in .swf 1./*****/*****.swf 2.http://****.com/****/**/****.swf
there wont be stars though they will be URL's
in my Hack example i will use a game called "D-Fence" we will use the game from [url=http://www.ebaumsworld.com]eBaumsWorld[/url] so go ahead and and go to www.ebaumsworld.com and find the game "D-Fence" or just click [url=http://ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/dfence.html]here[/url] now that we have found the game we need the url for the .swf since the page you play the game on ends with .html, to find the url that ends with .swf we must view the page source (CTRL+U in firefox | View > Source for IE) now press CTRL+F while viewing the page source (this is find) in the search box type ".swf" no quotes in this specific source you will end up finding something like this [code]<param name="movie" value="/2006/07/dfence.swf">[/code] all we need to pay attention to is [code]/2006/07/dfence.swf[/code] now notice how this is not a complete URL (it does not have a beginning) to solve this all we need to do it put this behind the main website for example we went to eBaumsWorld to play this game so we will put [code]/2006/07/dfence.swf[/code] in front of eBaumsWorld it should end up looking like this [code]http://www.ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/dfence.swf[/code] this is the direct URL to the game, now we have our URL that ends in .swf :) so now go to your Flash Hacker and put that into the URL box on the flash hacker then click GO! Your now into the game with the hacker...
Now we need to learn how to actually "Hack" the game it is actually VERY simple first click New Game (while playing the game) now click "Search variables"... variables are like your money, lives, score, and sometimes weapons when you click "search variables a box will come up when it does click search it will end up like this [img]http://img181.imageshack.us/img181/8192/varsxv8.png[/img] in this specific "hack" I'm not sure what "i" stand for but cash stands for well, your cash highlight "cash" and click search variable now it appeared in the variables box delete everything before the word "cash" and put a number next the the button cheat such as "123456" never put commas or anything unless the game usually does it by itself now click Cheat! your money should have changed, thats about it, have fun "hacking" games and such..
[hr][hr][hr]
[center]Pre-Found Games [tt]Click name to play game C&P Link given to "hack" game[/tt][/center]
[center][url=http://www.ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/demonic3.html]Demonic 3[/url] [code]http://www.ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/demonic3.swf[/code]
[url=http://www.xgenstudios.com/play/stickrpg]Stick RPG[/url] [code]http://www.xgenstudios.com/srpg/srpgcompletexgen.swf[/code]
[url=http://www.ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/stagknight.html]Stagknight [/url] [code]http://www.ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/stagknight.swf[/code]
[url=http://www.ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/simgirl.html]Sim Girl[/url] [code]http://www.ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/simgirl.swf[/code]
[url=http://www.ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/castle.html]Defend your Castle[/url] [code]http://www.ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/castle.swf[/code]
[url=http://www.ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/dfence.html]D-Fence[/url] [code]http://www.ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/dfence.swf[/code]
[url=http://www.ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/blackknight.html]Black Knight[/url] [code]http://www.ebaumsworld.com/2006/07/blackknight.swf[/code][/center]
post all questions & comments here.

item.title: How to "Hack" flash games.. [Download link is back!]
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

all you need to do is put this:

health
score
hp
hpmax
hp_max
max_hp
maxhp
maxhealth
max_health
fire
bonus
score_bonus
scorebonus
sbonus
a

i

100

player

tractionPoints
rank

bullets

pname
dwelling
driving
item_treadmill
item_satellite
item_books
item_freezer
item_minibar

intelligence
strength
hpmax
hp
cash

bankloan
bankloandays
bankrate

item_smokes
item_pills
item_knife
item_gun

item_tv
item_computer

barfight
music
day
time
car1s
car2s

ymove
mapx
mapy

Into a file called ‘search.txt’. Make sure its in the same directory as the flash hacker executable.

item.dc:creator: @hellou hellou
item.description:
@hellou wrote:

If you’re getting a error while searching for more variables make a text file called search and put this in it (you can add more if you want)

health score hp hpmax hp_max max_hp maxhp maxhealth max_health fire ammo bullets wanted bonus score_bonus scorebonus sbonus lives life money moneys cash bets bet points inv type sell pile coins coin time timer a b c d e f g h i g k l m n o p q r s t u v w x y z 02 100 % £ $

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Danny15:

I get error the search file wasnt found, And how do i use Cheatengine, i search a variable and i get like 100 things, then my cash goes from 2100 (which i searched) to 2200, so i search 2200 again and then nothing canged from the 2100.

MVP told me that the search button doesnt work.

So say in your flash game the money is called Cash

Put cash in the search thing but dont click search, Instead put like 1000 in the box next to “CHEAT” and then click cheat
